section_text: 1 1 The Northern Ireland (Date of Next Assembly Poll) Order 2001 ( SI  2001/3959) is revoked. 2 In section 31 of the Northern Ireland Act 1998 (c. 47)					(“ the 1998 Act ”), which provides for dates of Assembly elections and dissolutions, etc— a . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . b in subsection (3),  “or (2)”is omitted, c in subsection (5), at the end there is added  “, as shall any day on which section 1 of the Northern Ireland Act 2000 is in force”. 3 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 4 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 5 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 6 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 7 Subsection (1) does not revive any duty of the Secretary of State under section 32 of the 1998 Act (which provides for extraordinary elections) which he has already discharged. 8 In this section,  “ Assembly ” means Northern Ireland Assembly.
2 This Act may be cited as the Northern Ireland Assembly Elections Act 2003.
